name: Fakebook (MoGamer09, M_DC, jumbshd)
description:
Fakebook is the best game on itch.io.

Or is it? Well I guess you need to play it and find out. Because this game is all about detecting Fake Facts.

It’s designed as a social media plattform, so called fakebook, and tries to show you some fun obscurities in the way of a quizgame.

The game mechanics are simple, you get shown a fact and need to decide whether its true or not. If you are right, you get to see the next one, if you are wrong, the comments in game will tell you the truth.

The game was made in a week for brackeys gamejam 2022.1, by us, Mogamer09, m_dc and jumbshd, we hope you will enjoy it and learn a little bit more about our world.

My YouTube channel: https://youtube.com/channel/UCJ9PvXkjncskAp2-N8M4iaw
